entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kouchibouguac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 12:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 9.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: 2.2°C
Wind: W 18 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with ice pellets early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
